name: RELOAD 2 REMEMBER
description:
RELOAD 2 REMEMBER is a game for the Playdate.
That's a handheld console with a crank! You don't need the Playdate to play the game, though it sure is the best way to do it!!

Check out the install instructions down below.

WHAT:
You wake up in white darkness of a fog around you. You don’t know where nor who you are, but the fact that you are holding a sawed-off shotgun wakes up some memories. Not good ones.

HOW:
Your mind gets a bit foggy.
But you'll remember.
You know how to play.

(if you don't have a playdate console, use the mouse wheel or touchpad to simulate the crank. give it one good full crank.)

HOW LOUD:
Very. 
Blast those sounds.
